def_en: See also:machine tool; A tool is any instrument or simple piece of equipment that you hold in your hands and use to do a particular kind of work. For example, spades, hammers, and knives are all tools.
You can refer to anything that you use for a particular purpose as a particular type of tool .

def_cn: 受人利用的人;工具;傀儡
def_en: If you describe someone as a tool of a particular person, group, or system, you mean that they are controlled and used by that person, group, or system, especially to do unpleasant or dishonest things.

def_cn: (因罢工或抗议而突然)停工，放下工具
def_en: If you say that workers down tools, you mean that they stop working suddenly in order to strike or to make a protest of some kind.

def_cn: (技能、工具和设备等)从事某行当的工具
def_en: The tools of your trade or the tools of the trade are the skills, instruments, and other equipment that you need in order to do your job properly.
